information.author: Centreon
information.changelog: * Fixing wrong source types in v3.0 mapper (discovery instead of string)

description.value:
**Plugin Pack to monitor a Kubernetes cluster using CLI (kubectl) or RestAPI.**

Available host templates and related services:

| Cloud-Kubernetes-Api         |
|------------------------------|
| Cluster Events               |
| CronJob Status               |
| DaemonSet Status             |
| Deployment Status            |
| Node Status                  |
| Node Usage                   |
| PersistentVolume Status      |
| Pod Status                   |
| ReplicatSet Status           |
| ReplicationController Status |
| StatefulSet Status           |

| Cloud-Kubernetes-Node-Api |
|---------------------------|
| Node Usage                |
| Node Status               |

This pack comes with 2 Host Discovery providers:

- Kubernetes Nodes (Restapi)
- Kubernetes Nodes (Kubectl)

This pack comes with 10 Service Discovery rules:

- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-CronJobs-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-Daemonsets-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-Deployments-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-Nodes-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-Nodes-Usage
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-PersistentVolumes-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-Pods-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-ReplicaSets-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-ReplicationControllers-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-StatefulSets-Status

**Plugin Pack pour superviser un cluster Kubernetes avec la CLI (kubectl) ou la RestAPI**

Modèles d\'hôte disponibles et leurs services :

| Cloud-Kubernetes-Api         |
|------------------------------|
| Cluster Events               |
| CronJob Status               |
| DaemonSet Status             |
| Deployment Status            |
| Node Status                  |
| Node Usage                   |
| PersistentVolume Status      |
| Pod Status                   |
| ReplicatSet Status           |
| ReplicationController Status |
| StatefulSet Status           |

| Cloud-Kubernetes-Node-Api |
|---------------------------|
| Node Usage                |
| Node Status               |

Ce pack fournit 2 règles de découverte d\'hôte:

- Kubernetes Nodes (Restapi)
- Kubernetes Nodes (Kubectl)

Ce pack fournit 10 règles de découverte de service:

- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-CronJobs-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-Daemonsets-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-Deployments-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-Nodes-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-Nodes-Usage
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-PersistentVolumes-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-Pods-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-ReplicaSets-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-ReplicationControllers-Status
- Cloud-Kubernetes-Api-StatefulSets-Status

information.name: Kubernetes API
information.status_message: Fixing wrong source types in v3.0 mapper
